name: nodejs-faizhamed
description: NodeJS Boilerplate (Implementing NodeJS without using NPM for web, api & cli)

scripts.build: mkdir .logs .data && cd .data && mkdir users checks tokens && cd .. && cd https && openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -new -nodes -x509 -days 3650 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem

author: Faiz A. Farooqui <faizz.af@gmail.com>
